One of the key benefits of the promo cod: One of the key benefits of the promo code module is its commission structure. When a customer uses a promo code provided by a partner or affiliate, the partner earns a commission on the sale. This incentivizes partners to promote the business and drive traffic to the platform, resulting in mutually beneficial partnerships that contribute to revenue growth.
